entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:52 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 12:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm near Lake Erie. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
